info.name: Puella Magi Tumblr Magica
info.description:
Being Tumblr is suffering :(

Puella Magi Madoka Magica Theme

Icons fixed for new tumblr layout; please update! :)
info.additionalInfo:
More color variations to come.

NOTE: Due to the new tumblr update, icons will appear distorted on reblog pages.
      A solution or workaround is being looked into.
      All other aspects should be working normally.
